Convert Between AnnData and SingleCellExperiment

Source: R/SingleCellExperiment.R
SingleCellExperiment.Rd

to_SingleCellExperiment() converts an AnnData object to a SingleCellExperiment.

from_SingleCellExperiment() converts a SingleCellExperiment to an AnnData object.

Usage

to_SingleCellExperiment(object)

from_SingleCellExperiment(
  sce,
  output_class = c("InMemory", "HDF5AnnData"),
  ...
)

Arguments

object

an AnnData object, e.g., InMemoryAnnData

sce

An object inheriting from SingleCellExperiment.

output_class

Name of the AnnData class. Must be one of "HDF5AnnData" or "InMemoryAnnData".

...

Additional arguments passed to the generator function. See the "Details" section for more information on which parameters

Value

to_SingleCellExperiment() returns a SingleCellExperiment representing the content of object.

from_SingleCellExperiment() returns an AnnData object (e.g., InMemoryAnnData) representing the content of sce.

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  ## useful when interacting with the SingleCellExperiment !
  library(SingleCellExperiment)
}
ad <- InMemoryAnnData$new(
  X = matrix(1:15, 3L, 5L),
  layers = list(
    A = matrix(15:1, 3L, 5L),
    B = matrix(letters[1:15], 3L, 5L)
  ),
  obs = data.frame(cell = 1:3),
  var = data.frame(gene = 1:5),
  obs_names = LETTERS[1:3],
  var_names = letters[1:5]
)

## construct a SingleCellExperiment from an AnnData object
sce <- to_SingleCellExperiment(ad)
#> Warning: replacing previous import ‘S4Arrays::makeNindexFromArrayViewport’ by ‘DelayedArray::makeNindexFromArrayViewport’ when loading ‘SummarizedExperiment’
sce
#> class: SingleCellExperiment 
#> dim: 5 3 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(3): X A B
#> rownames(5): a b c d e
#> rowData names(1): gene
#> colnames(3): A B C
#> colData names(1): cell
#> reducedDimNames(0):
#> mainExpName: NULL
#> altExpNames(0):

## construct an AnnData object from a SingleCellExperiment
from_SingleCellExperiment(sce, "InMemory")
#> class: InMemoryAnnData
#> dim: 3 obs x 5 var
#> X: matrix
#> layers: A B
#> obs: cell
#> var: gene
